pageContext.claim: “[Germany] -- they pay a lot of money to Russia for oil and gas, the pipeline, they pay money to Russia, billions and billions of dollars, and then we're supposed to protect them from Russia.”
pageContext.analysis: This energy project is opposed not only by Trump but also by the United Kingdom, the EU and other nations. Russian energy giant Gazprom is building an energy pipeline in Germany. Trump says it doesn't make sense for Germany to be contributing to NATO on one hand and increasing its reliance on Russia on the other. But as the NATO secretary general said right after Trump's comment, "Even during the Cold War, NATO allies were trading with Russia."
